translated: The gods who are not careless will tell the new gods all this and then go to the place where the mountain known as Moving Mound is located.

translated: “ ‘Sitting on the ground of existence, the gods will sing various songs and play delightful music together with their companions. When the new gods see them all enjoying themselves in the same way, they will begin to investigate.

analyzed: zhes sa de dag rnams su'ang brgyus par gyur nas gang na brtsegs pa rgyu ba'i ri de yod pa der zhugs so //
translated: “ ‘I will go alone to those mountain caves,” they will think, and so they will go to those places. They will then enter the mountain known as Moving Mound.

original: de nas des lha'i bu mo'i tshogs ches che ba rnams rgyan dang cha byad du ma dang / bca' bdar du mas nye bar brgyan pa /

analyzed: rnam pa du ma'i rol mo dang / rnga sgra dang / glu dbyangs kyis rab tu dga' bar gyur pa rnams mthong ngo //

original: de nas lha mo de dag rnams kyis lha mngon par gsar bar mthong nas kun tu bskor nas mchog tu rab tu dga' ba /
analyzed: de nas lha mo de dag rnams kyis lha mngon par gsar bar mthong nas kun tu bskor nas mchog tu rab tu dga' ba /

analyzed: mchog tu rgya che ba'i cha byad dang rgyan can ngo mtshar bar gyur pa'i mig dag gis lha de mchod par bya'o //
translated: With eyes wide with wonder, they worship the god with the most delightful and expansive attire and ornaments.

original: zhes byas nas nye bar gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: zhes byas nas nye bar gnas par gyur to //
translated: They stand there,

original: de nas thag nye bar bsnyen te byin nas kyang lha mo de dag rnams de dang por mthong ba tshim zhing mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis lha de la 'di skad ces smras so //

analyzed: ji ltar lha khyod nyid mthong bas ched du byas te nges 'dir 'ongs kyi /

original: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu /
analyzed: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu /
translated: The result of your own actions

original: dge ba'i 'bras bu nags dang / nye ba'i nags rnams dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ri'i sul dang / gad logs dang / ri zhol rnams su dga' bar mdzod /

translated: Enjoy the fruits of virtue in the forests and parks, in the various mountain valleys, on the mountain slopes and foothills.

original: gzhan yang mtho ris kyis gnas @44b rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba rnams dang / ri du ma rnams la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi shing gi tshogs kun nas 'dud pa mi g-yo ba rnams dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang mtho ris kyis gnas @44b rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba rnams dang / ri du ma rnams la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi shing gi tshogs kun nas 'dud pa mi g-yo ba rnams dang /
translated: Moreover, in the heavenly realms, there are various garlands of light rays that are made of the seven precious substances, and there are many mountains with various trees that are always bowed down with flowers.

translated: In the forests of the mountains, there are houses made of vines, and in the heavenly realms there are various sounds of music, the sounds of drums and songs, and the places are bright with the seven precious substances.

original: gzhan yang yul phyogs gzhan rnams la 'bab chu dang / chu klung dang / tshang tshing dang / padma'i tshal rnam pa du ma rnams dang / gzhan yang nam mkha'i dkyil na gzhal yas khang brgya stong dang rab tu ldan par mchog tu dga' ba rnams la bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig tu lha dga' bar mdzod /

translated: Moreover, in other regions there are waterfalls, rivers, thickets, and many kinds of lotus groves. Furthermore, in the middle of the sky there are hundreds of thousands of palaces. With all of this, enjoy yourselves to the fullest!”

original: de nas dge ba'i las rnams thams cad las byung bar gyur pa'i lha des de dag rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas dge ba'i las rnams thams cad las byung bar gyur pa'i lha des de dag rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //

analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad kyis ngoms par byed pa'i mtho ris kyis rnams su bdag cag rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dga' bar bya'o //
translated: “Let us enjoy ourselves in the heavens, where all desires are fulfilled.”

original: de nas phan tshun lhan cig tu sna tshogs pa'i rnga sgra sgrog par gyur pas rab tu dga' ba dang ldan pa'i yid can rnams @45a *//

analyzed: pheg rdob pa'i glu mkhan gyi sgra chags par 'gyur ba'i dbyangs kyi sgra du ma rnams so //

translated: In the forests and parks, the tops of the mango trees are like garlands of blue. On the ground, there are various kinds of birds that are colorful and beautiful, and the birds are also colorful with the seven precious substances.

original: dga' bar byed par mthong ngo //
analyzed: dga' bar byed par mthong ngo //

analyzed: de ltar thang rnams la rnam par mthong bar gyur nas de dag rnams mthong nas chu rnams la yang mthong bar 'gyur ba ni /

translated: The proud karṇḍa birds, the dūrvā birds, and the danta birds, with their eyes darting about, observe the various forms of the colorful trees in the forest of blue trees.

translated: “ ‘Moreover, as he looks into the sky, he will experience various pleasures of the senses. translated: The birds that swim in the water are colorful with their various shapes of blue, yellow, and red. The gods watch them with the greatest delight.

analyzed: de nas thams cad du lha'i tshogs mthong ba ni /
